item.description:
It's MYSTERY ENVELOPE day - so $20 admission gets you bingo cards, and a surprise inside the envelope - many times it's a coupon for half off your breakfast buffet cost!

Gotta get there early if you want to sit in the non-smoking room.  I recommend arriving by 7:15 or 7:30 to get into the non-smoking room.  Doors open at 8.

We 'stake our bingo claim' then head over to the buffet for breakfast.  Return by 10 am to set up for several hours of bingo fun.  Someone always wins... maybe not in our party, but someone does!!!

Must be 18 to play.
item.name: Breakfast and Bingo
